mobs.LongDesc: A cute little Munchkin kiddie is standing here.
The mayor of the Munchkin City sits here looking very important.
A merry Munchkin fisherman is happily fishing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This Munchkin fisherman is ready for a long day of fishing.  He is well
tanned by long hours in the sun and looks very fit.  You get the feeling that
he does not like being disturbed.

mobs.LongDesc: A pink bubble is floating here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A lovely pink bubble is floating slowly on the breeze.  If you look closely
at its irridescent surface, you can see a distorted image of yourself.

mobs.LongDesc: A shopkeeper named "Shorty" is waiting patiently to help you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Shorty the Grocer is an unusually plump Munchkin, with a round pot belly and
a merry smile.  He has a very long beard that is braided at the end and is
wearing a white apron over the usual blue Munchkin-style clothes that all of
the Munchkins wear.  He smiles at you expectantly.

mobs.LongDesc: A crow sits here flapping its wings and staring at you with beady eyes.
The Scarecrow is standing here looking rather lumpy.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This shabby scarecrow is crudely made from old, tattered clothes stuffed
with straw.  A stuffed burlap bag serves as head.  It has a friendly face
painted on it which somehow seems alive.  It must be your imagination!

mobs.LongDesc: Mombi the Witch stands here glaring at you with a look of pure evil.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Mombi is a withered old hag dressed in shabby robes and hobbling about on a
cane.  Her gnarled hands look very strong and have long, jagged nails that
have been filed to sharp points.  You sense an aura of great evil as Mombi
stares at you with her dead eyes.

mobs.LongDesc: A huge, gnarled apple tree almost seems to be staring at you here.
The Tin Woodsman is standing here gleaming brightly.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Tin Woodsman is a beautifully crafted replica of a man but fashioned
of bolts, rivets, and sheets of tin instead of flesh.  He has a jaunty
look on his face that goes well with his tin bowtie and funnel cap.  He
glimmers softly in the diffuse forest light and smells faintly of machine
oil.  He looks at you with a friendly smile.

mobs.LongDesc: The Cowardly Lion paces back and forth nervously while he watches you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This immense beast is the largest lion you have ever seen.  Massively
muscled with huge jaws filled with dagger sharp teeth, this savage beast
could easily rip out your throat and tear you to shreds.  For some reason,
the lion looks at you uneasily.

mobs.LongDesc: A Nome worker is gathering some blue moss here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Nome has skin and clothing that is the same color as the rocks that
surround you.  He is extremely thin and seems to fade in and out while he
moves about.  He has a bag slung over his shoulder and seems overworked.

mobs.LongDesc: A burly Nome miner is digging up precious gems for his King here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This Nome miner looks strong and aggressive.  He is sweating from his labors
and is covered with a fine layer of dust.  He glares at you with an evil look
that makes you wonder if you should move on.

mobs.LongDesc: Boq stands here getting ready to return to his fields.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Boq is dressed in the typical blue clothes that almost all of the Munchkins
wear.  His face is deeply tanned and he squints slightly after many years
in the bright Oz sun.  When you glance at his heavily caloused hands, you
could almost swear that his thumb looked a little green!

mobs.LongDesc: The Nome foreman is standing here glowering at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This Nome is much larger than most of the other Nomes you have seen.  He is
dressed in dusty, stone colored clothes and has a serious, no-nonsense look
about him.  He does not look pleased to see you in his mines.

mobs.LongDesc: A huge salamander covered in flames is chained to the floor here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The enchanted creature resembles a huge lizard covered with sheets of flame
that do not appear to harm it in the least.  A huge collar surrounds its neck
and a heavy chain is bolted to the floor to imprison it here.  After centuries
of imprisonment by the Nome King, the salamander is pretty hot!

mobs.LongDesc: A sour-looking little Munchkin named Gloom is sitting here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This unusually small Munchkin looks sour and unpleasant.  He is sitting
at a table nursing a beer while he glares unpleasantly at all of the people
in the Inn.

mobs.LongDesc: A fierce Nome warrior emerges from the rock and glares at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This battle-hardened veteran of the Nome King's many campaigns of conquest
looks like a deadly and merciless opponent.  He is much larger than most of 
the Nomes you have seen and does not have the typical pot belly.  He is 
heavily muscled and moves with the silent grace of a cat.

mobs.LongDesc: A crafty Nome jeweler is plying his trade here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This wizened Nome craftsman has a leather apron worn over his clothing.  
His rheumy eyes are bloodshot and permanently locked into a perpetual squint
from years of setting gemstones and creating jewelry for the King.  He is
thinner than most of the other Nomes you have seen but his wirey frame looks
strong and fit.

mobs.LongDesc: The Nome King, Roquat the Red stands here imperiously.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Roquat the Red looks smaller and meaner than most of his subjects.  His
haughty demeanor and souless gaze make you feel that he values no life other
than his own.  Dissipated and venal, the King of the Nomes is not to be 
trifled with.  It would be best if you had never come this far.

mobs.LongDesc: General Blug is standing here at attention.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
General Blug is an unusually tall Nome with grey whiskers that almost reach
the floor.  His rock-colored uniform is covered with medals and is neatly
pressed.  He stands stiffly at attention but you notice that his eyes move
constantly, scanning the room for threats to the Nome King.

mobs.LongDesc: A fearsome Kalidah stands ready to pounce on you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This immense and powerful creature is a Kalidah, with the body of a bear and
the head of a tiger.  Its powerful claws and sharp fangs make it an incredibly
effective predator, as is its appetite for blood and raw flesh.  Heavily
muscled and extremely agile and quick, these creatures rarely are killed by
either man or beast.

mobs.ShortDesc: a member of the Lollipop Guild
mobs.LongDesc: A member of the Lollipop Guild is busy eating a lollipop.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This young Munchkin is a member of the notorious Lollipop Guild, a secret
society of teenage Munchkins who spend all of their time munching lollipops
when they should be working in the fields.  The youngster looks somewhat
hyperactive, probably from all of the sugar.  His face and hands are sticky
and he seems a little plump.

mobs.LongDesc: A Munchkin constable is walking his beat here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This portly Munchkin is a member of the local constabulary.  There is almost
no crime in the Munchkin City so this constable looks relaxed and somewhat
bored.  He smiles and nods at all of the passersby but you notice that he is
keeping a wary eye on all strangers, including you.

mobs.ShortDesc: a member of the Lullabye League
mobs.LongDesc: A member of the Lullabye League is sleeping here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This beautiful Munchkin girl is extremely petite, and is barely tall enough
to reach your waist.  She is dressed in a beautiful blue silk nightshirt and
looks like she just rolled out of bed.

mobs.LongDesc: An emerald green snake slithers into view near your feet.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This slender snake is bright green and almost three feet long.  It's hide
has an unearthly, irridescent shimmer and it moves with remarkable speed
without making the slightest noise.  You notice that it's head is diamond
shaped and its fangs are rather long.

mobs.LongDesc: A beautiful peacock is strutting by with his tail plumes displayed.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This beautiful peacock has the most spectacular plumage you have ever seen.
It has a haughty look as it struts around and preens at his feathers.

mobs.LongDesc: A huge black bird flutters angrily over your head.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This huge bird resembles a crow except that it is huge, easily outweighing
you.  It is covered with coarse, black feathers and has beady eyes that dart
around, glaring angrily at you.  Its beak is sharp, as are its talons.  It
does not look happy to find you near its nest.

mobs.LongDesc: A beautiful carpet of poppies grows beneath your feet.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Beautiful poppies grow thickly here, creating a fragrant carpet of blossoms
that is very comfortable to walk upon.  You detect a faint haze from the
heavy pollen that the sticky blooms give off.  The odor is faintly sweet and
makes you feel rather sleepy.

mobs.LongDesc: A fat honey bee is lazily buzzing from flower to flower.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This tiny insect buzzes noisly as it moves from blossom to blossom, looking
for pollen.  It has a narrow yellow marking circling its abdomen and a nasty
looking stinger protrudes from its rear end.

mobs.LongDesc: A nervous horse is tethered here by the wagon.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This nice looking horse looks well cared for and well fed.  The howling
winds are making him nervous and he is pulling a little on the tether that
is tied to the wagon.

mobs.LongDesc: A rather sad-looking cow is floating by upside down.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This heifer looks like a typical cow except for that fact that is floating
upside down inside a tornado.  It looks rather stunned.

mobs.LongDesc: The Jitterbug stands here waving its mandibles at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This huge insect is easily six feet tall and stands erect on two of its
legs.  It has a heavilly armored, wasp-like body with long, articulated legs
that are covered with dangerous looking spines.  It's mandibles look
powerful enough to tear any creature apart and it stares at you with its
multi-faceted eyes.

mobs.LongDesc: One of the castle guards is standing at his post here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The warrior standing guard here is tall and heavily-muscled, with the
predatory look of a battle-hardened veteran.  His skin has a strange, bluish
cast to it and his teeth appear to have been filed to sharp points.

mobs.LongDesc: An off duty guard is sitting here sharpening a nasty-looking dagger.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This guard looks battle-hardened and world-weary.  He is using his off
duty hours to work on his equipment, oiling his leather equipment and
maintaining a keen edge on all of his weapons.  He seems absorbed in his
knife-sharpening and does not appear to notice you enter the room.

mobs.LongDesc: One of the castle guards is patrolling here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This guard is tall and heavily-muscled with a battle-hardened gaze that
sends shivers up your spine.  His skin has an odd, bluish color that adds
to his ferocious appearance.  He stares at you with an evil grin and prepares
to attack.

mobs.LongDesc: A flying monkey comes diving at you out of nowhere, howling and screeching.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This disgusting creature is a large monkey that has enormous wings
sprouting from its back.  It is wearing an odd leather harness and has a
heavy iron ring around its neck.  Even from a distance you can clearly see
its vicious teeth and long claws.

mobs.LongDesc: Professor Marvel is sitting here relaxing by the campfire.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Professor Marvel is a rather distinguished-looking gentlemen wearing a
dark frock coat with a red vest, black pants, and a wide-brimmed hat.  His
clothes look dirty and a bit shabby but he smiles at you with a merry twinkle
in his eye.

mobs.LongDesc: Uncle Henry is making sure the livestock is out of the barn.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Uncle Henry is an old, tired-looking farmer whose skin is dark and deeply
lined by years of hard work in the hot Kansas countryside.  He is wearing
denin overalls, heavy boots, and an old shirt that has been carefully
mended many, many times.  He looks worried about his farm.

mobs.LongDesc: Aunt Em is here looking for her niece Dorothy.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Aunt Em is in her fifties and looks tired and careworn.  Despite her age
she looks strong and is searching desperately for her niece Dorothy who must
be missing.  She is wearing a gingham dress and an apron that are blowing
wildly in the wind.

mobs.LongDesc: Miss Gulch is walking here looking sour and totally pissed off.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Miss Gulch is an aging spinster whose money and power has not made her
happy nor kept her looking young.  She is stomping along with a sour look
on her face and looks angry at the world.  Her expensive clothes are dust
streaked and sweat is beading up across her forhead.

mobs.LongDesc: The Wicked Witch stares at you with an unholy hunger.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Wicked Witch of the West is a vile and disgusting creature whose
years of practicing the unholy arts has left her a withered, dessicated
creature barely recognizable as a human being.  Her skin has a greenish
tinge and is stretched taut over her bones.  Her claw-like hands are making
strange gesture as she licks her cracked lips in anticipation.

mobs.LongDesc: A flying monkey screeches at you for entering the Aerie.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This disgusting creature is a large monkey that has enormous wings
sprouting from its back.  It is wearing an odd leather harness and has an
iron ring around its neck.  It is leaping about furiously preparing to
attack.

mobs.LongDesc: The Wizard of Oz is stand here looking like a humbug.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The famous and powerful Wizard of Oz is an unassuming little man who
looks more like an English teacher than a being of immense magic power.
He looks friendly enough and smiles at you with a slightly embarassed
expression on his face.

mobs.LongDesc: The Palace guard looks at you with disdain and sniffs.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Palace guard is tall and imposing.  He stands at attention and glares
at you with utter contempt.  He is wearing an emerald green greatcoat and
has a long, drooping mustache.

mobs.LongDesc: A horse with oddly changing skin color is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This spectacular horse stands here with its tail twitching, eyeing you
with curiously intellingent eyes.  It is beautifully groomed with mane and
tail braided and oiled.  Its odd green color surprises you at first, and
even more so as its color slowly shifts to purple, orange, yellow, and back
to green again.

mobs.LongDesc: Jack Pumpkinhead is standing here unsteadily, grinning like an idiot.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Jack Pumpkinhead is a strange creature with a body made of roughly
whittled branches crudely pinned together to fashion the spindly arms and
legs that are attached to a log torso.  Brightly colored clothes are hung
on his odd frame and a bright orange pumpkin carved with a huge smile is
impaled onto the sharpened stick that serves as a neck.  Amazingly enough,
Jack Pumpkinhead is alive and well and smiling at you.

mobs.LongDesc: The Innkeeper smiles at you from behind the bar.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Innkeeper is a somewhat stout man who looks happy and prosperous.
He has a ruddy complexion and is heavily built.  He looks like he runs 
a tight ship and has a lot of fun doing it.

This gentleman has had a few too many and is starting to nod off.  He is
leaning heavily on the table and is about to go face first into his beer.

mobs.LongDesc: A rowdy patron is bellowing some tuneless drinking song.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This guy is obviously feeling on pain as he bellows out some obnoxious
drinking song that has no tune and no discernable words that you can
understand.  He looks fit but his face is flushed and sweaty and he is
completely ignoring you.

mobs.LongDesc: An off-duty guard is drinking here and is eyeing you carefully.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This guard is still in uniform but is clearly off duty.  He is drinking
a beer but is watching you carefully from across the room.

mobs.LongDesc: A little girl is sleeping quietly here on top of the bed.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This little girl must be Dorothy Gale!  The gingham dress and the ruby
slippers are a dead giveaway.  She is very dear to the people of the Emerald
City and to the Wizard himself.  Best not to disturb her nap!

mobs.LongDesc: The Gatekeeper guards the city entrance and watches you warily.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Gatekeeper of the Emerald City is dressed elegantly and has an air
of tremendous self-importance.  After glancing at your travel stained 
clothing and foreign appearance, he is not really paying any attention to
you.  You guess he will NOT let you into the city.

mobs.LongDesc: A vicious looking troll ponders your impending death.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is your typical, under-the-bridge type of troll.  Huge, muscular,
and extremely pissed.  His face is contorted into a look of pure rage as he
attacks you for trespassing.

mobs.LongDesc: A cute little Cairn terrier is resting here.  His name must be Toto!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Toto is a typical Cairn terrier with bright, beady eyes and a tail that
wags constantly.  He looks well fed and well groomed and is alertly watching
for threats to his little mistress.

mobs.LongDesc: A huge rat hisses at you and stands its ground.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This rat is about the size of a small dog.  Its dark, beady eyes stare 
at you with no sign of fear while its whiskers and naked pink tail 
twitch from side to side.  You wonder what diseases the huge creature
must carry.

mobs.LongDesc: A wizened pawnbroker eyes your equipment with an appraising look.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This old, wrinkled man moves rather slowly but has an intense look in his
eyes.  His old, rheumy eyes flicker across your equipment, silently
appraising what he can see and guessing at what he cannot.
